overview: Doctor Phil Latio is a man who gets down to cases, and in his sex clinic, so do the patients. His fatherly concerns for young muffin is touching and he rises to the occasion when the beautiful sympathetic needs a session on his couch. Can Doctor Latio and his staff satisfy all his patients needs? Does this film feature three of the most spectacular big-breasted beauties Harold Lime has ever lensed? The answer to both questions is a resounding “yes”!
title: Doctor Desire
